SEARCH
Package com.group7.krisefikser.controller

Class StorageItemController

java.lang.Object
com.group7.krisefikser.controller.StorageItemController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/storage-items") public class StorageItemController extends Object
StorageItemController handles HTTP requests related to storage items. It provides endpoints for CRUD operations and filtering/sorting storage items. Operations are scoped to the household ID of the authenticated user.
